txt.en: 'Hail, [placeholder]! You assisted in defeating Núrzum, but the enemy has not given up. They still roam our lands and lurk in the shadows.\n\n'Conog terrorizes the southern edge of the Whitshaws. Go there and show him that Wildermore will endure!'
You have defeated Conog, earning the gratitude of the people of Wildermore.
<rgb=#FF0000>Completing Wildermore's Recovery will cancel this quest.</rgb>
Núrzum has been defeated, but the enemy persists throughout much of Wildermore. Conog terrorizes the southern edge of the Whitshaws.
Conog can be found patrolling the southern Whitshaws with a horde of White Hand minions.
You have defeated Conog, earning the gratitude of the people of Wildermore.
